name: BandPage
description: BandPage is the official online artist profile. Over 500,000 musicians use BandPage, the most powerful way to reach fans & earn money.

apis.name: Bandpage
apis.description:
Bandpage is an online platform for musicians, bands, fans, and the music industry can connect and interact. BandPage lets musicians manage their online presence by updating and sharing info, music, videos, photos, and shows online. 

The Bandpage API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Bandpage with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include managing account and band information, creating and sharing music and other files, and retrieving information about bands.
